divs: Sighting DetailsMy friend wanted to go on to the roof, of his apartment building on the corner of 10th street & 1st avenue in the east village of New York City, to see the stars and planets. It was a clear night. He was pointing out orion's belt, sirius dog stars many constellations and the planets mars & saturn. He said if we stare in this sectio, which i think was north east, we might be able to see a shooting star. We stared for a many minutes until he said look whats that? Then to the right, which i think was east of us was a black triangular craft hovering low and moving slowly away from us. All 3 of us saw it. Then it turned behind a taller building across the street. We walked towards the other end of the roof to see if it would come back around. But I was very cold and scared and told them we should go inside. I would not have believed this If they hadnt seen it too. If anyone told me they saw it I would think they were crazy but all 3 of us DID see it! I feel it is my duty to report this event to mufon and that everyone should know that this really did happen. On Saturday November 28th 2009 Myself and 2 of my friends saw a silent slow moving black triangular ufo over new york city.
Summary: Myself and 2 of my friends saw a black triangular UFO over New York City.
